titleproper.value:
Guide to the Collection of Theses from the Faculty of Arts and Science, Department of Economics
                    <num>MC 119</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Darren W. Johnson in 1989. Revised by Caroline Moseley in 1990. Additional description in 2014 by Connor Gaudet.

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2014-12-18T10:52-0500</date>

unittitle.value: Collection of Masters Theses from the Faculty of Arts and Science, Department of Economics

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: This collection contains a selection of masters theses written by students from the Department of Economics between 1971 and 1979.

p.value: The Department of Economics now offers undergraduate, masters, and doctoral degrees.

This collection contains a selection of masters theses written by students from the Department of Economics between 1971 and 1979. A full list of thesis authors and titles may be found at the Archives. This collection does not contain all graduate theses written by students but is, rather, a selection that was collected by the Department during this time period.

corpname.value: New York University. Department of Economics.
